author: andreas
content: Paul, I guess the bigger the flakes, the more the need for off-camera flash. In my case it were very small flakes, and the flash has exaggerated them. I could probably have taken back flash intensity to avoid making the flakes the brightest part of the scene, but then, I also wanted to convey a kind of magic. Thus I think it worked pretty well. For big flakes it would not work, or probably it would, if you were some steps back under a porch or some roof.
